summary: Build a travel services website for Ravinder Travels (travel, taxi, car rental, pickup/drop) including business name and address details.
architectural_notes: Logo requirement: "RT" in red to be used as the site logo/brand mark.
known_issues: Deployment error occurred during release of Version 2 (launch unsuccessful).

existing_features.title: Create a responsive marketing website for the business named "Ravinder Travels" that clearly communicates the offered services: travel, taxi, car rental, and pickup/drop.
Display the business address exactly as provided: "RK Puram Sector 4, New Delhi 110022" in the site footer and on a dedicated Contact section/page.

Add a "Book a Ride / Request a Quote" form that collects basic trip details (name, phone, service type, pickup location, drop location, date/time, notes) and submits the request to the backend for storage.
Apply a coherent, distinctive visual theme across the site (colors, typography, spacing, components) suitable for a Delhi-based travel/taxi brand; avoid blue/purple as the primary palette.
Display the business contact phone number "+91 7840057815" (exact digits: 7840057815) in the Contact section and in the site footer, replacing the existing placeholder phone text.
Make the displayed phone number clickable where it appears (use a tel link) so users can tap/click to call 7840057815.
Update the site logo to a red "RT" logo mark and use it as the site logo in the header in place of the current generated logo image.

Update the displayed business contact email address to "vikkisingh9604@gmail.com" everywhere it appears on the marketing site (at minimum: Contact section and site footer), replacing the current "info@ravindertravels.com" value.
Make the displayed email address clickable wherever it appears by using a mailto link to "vikkisingh9604@gmail.com".

Publish the current application version by performing a full build and deployment of both the Motoko canister backend and the React frontend, ensuring the deployment succeeds (including avoiding the previously observed Version 2 deployment failure) and the live site serves the latest build.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a travel services website for Ravinder Travels offering travel, taxi, car rental, and pickup/drop services, showing the business name and address (RK Puram Sector 4, New Delhi 110022).
Implement the backend data model and APIs to store and retrieve booking/quote requests in a single Motoko actor.
Add and display the business contact phone number "7840057815" (e.g., in header/footer and Contact section).
Update/define the brand logo to be "RT" in red (use as site logo).
Update the site contact email to the correct address: vikkisingh9604@gmail.com (display in Contact section/footer and use for contact links/forms if applicable).
